meanings.definition: A Greek sea god capable of changing shape at will.
meanings.sent1: In the ancient story, Proteus transformed into various creatures to avoid capture.
meanings.sent2: The sailors feared encountering Proteus, unsure of what form he would take.
meanings.sent3: Proteus decided to become a dolphin for a day, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her ever-changing emotions were like Proteus, never staying the same for long.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious figure by the shore seemed to shift like Proteus, elusive and unpredictable.

meanings.sent5: The Proteus bacteria multiplied rapidly, filling the water with their presence.
